subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “black; numerous”
: Cognate with {{zh-l|*黧|black}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}).
; “Li people”
: From {{bor|zh|lic|Hlai}}. Alleged to be used in Eastern Han dynasty book {{w|Yiwu Zhi}}:
{{zh-x|《^南裔 ^異物 ^志》謂：^俚 在 ^廣州 之 南，俗 呼 ^俚 為 ^𥠖。|ref=顧炎武《天下郡國利病書》, early Qing dynasty}}

Before Song dynasty, {{zh-l|俚}} was a more common term.

{{etystub|zh}}
